2023.title: Wolfi (Chainguard Linux)
2023.description: Wolfi, released by Chainguard in 2023, is a security‑focused Linux distro designed for reproducible, supply‑chain hardened container builds.

2023.title: Sysdig Falco
2023.description: Falco, a CNCF runtime security project, experienced major growth in 2023, offering real‑time detection for anomalous syscall and Kubernetes API behavior.

2023.title: LlamaFirewall
2023.description: LlamaFirewall, introduced in 2023, is a system‑level security framework aimed at protecting large‑language‑model‑powered applications from jailbreaks, prompt injection, and other AI‑centric threats.

2023.title: Woodpecker
2023.description: Woodpecker, launched in 2023, is an open‑source red‑teaming automation tool for AI systems, Kubernetes clusters, and APIs, designed to uncover and remediate security weaknesses.

2023.title: IntelMQ
2023.description: IntelMQ, used for collecting and processing security feeds, received updates in 2023 increasing support for SOC and CERT telemetry ingestion.

2023.title: GoSearch
2023.description: GoSearch, an open‑source OSINT tool for mapping usernames and digital footprints, became prominent in 2023 threat‑hunting workflows.
